alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 08 at 4:20AM EDT until April 10 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level possible in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along Bogue Banks, Bogue Sound, the Newport and White Oak Rivers, and adjacent tidal creeks, and areas in North Topsail Beach, the lower New River, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes adjacent to the waterfront will experience shallow flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/10 AM 3.8 -2.0 1.2 1-2 None 08/10 PM 4.9 -0.9 1.5 1-2 None 09/11 AM 4.2 -1.6 1.7 1-2 None 09/11 PM 5.6 -0.2 2.1 1 Moderate 10/12 PM 4.0 -1.8 1.6 1 None 11/12 AM 4.9 -0.9 1.5 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
